name: Da Vinci Studio
tagline: Mobile and Web development with Machine Learning
description:
Da Vinci is an established software development company specializing in the agile development of web and mobile applications. Right from the start, our main focus has been to provide high quality services and full support for our customers. We reduce engineering risk for clients by offering rapid time-to-market while delivering standards-based software code that can be transitioned to an internal team at any time.
We offer cooperate in fields:
•    web applications (ERP, CRM, e-learning)
•    mobile applications
•    e-commerce
•    machine learning 
•    programmer outsourcing
